title: Fill the Form
description: Fill the application form. You can impress us with a great background or motivation and will power to become a web developer or AI engineer.

title: Take the Quiz
description: Take our benchmark to assess your current level in HTML, CSS, JavaScript & Computer Science (for Full Stack) or Math, Python and Computer Science (for AI)

title: 1-1 Quiz Review
description: The final stage. You're going to discuss your project with Teaching Partner in a Zoom call. We'll send you a link where you can book a slot for your interview.
